name: Animated duck
description: Three fully animated duck game sprites. The animations for this game asset include, walk, swim, fly, die, and idle, You'l find all the transitions to these animation included in the download too. You can easily create more animations using the included fully rigged Spriter file puppet. You'll find spritesheets for quickly including the animations into your project. You can re export the spritesheets upto three times larger for really high definition.
